title: CIT Northbridge and Tiger Finance Arrange Financing of Up to $47 Million for a Leading E-Commerce Seller of Branded Products - PR Newswire
content: CIT Northbridge and Tiger Finance Arrange Financing of Up to $47 Million for a Leading E-Commerce Seller of Branded Products  PR Newswire
description: /PRNewswire/ -- CIT Northbridge Credit, as advised by CIT Asset Management, and Tiger Finance today announced they have arranged up to $47 million in financing...
